use.flag: Use system zlib instead of bundled one. This is incompatible with older rsync releases!

pkgmetadata.longdescription: Rsync-bpc is a customized version of rsync that is used as part of BackupPC. Rsync-bpc is fully line-compatible with vanilla rsync, so it can talk to rsync servers and clients. Rsync-bpc serves no purpose outside of BackupPC.
